entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
